Case Packaing=rpm: goal=package-rpm, packages=default (count=0) => src/main/unix/files
Case: Packaging=dpkg, goal=package-dpkg, packages=default+slave (count > 0) => src/main/unix/files/all src/main/unix/files/default src/main/unix/files/slave
Case: Packaging=jar, goal=attached-dpkg, packages=default+slave => src/main/unix/files/all-all src/main/unix/files/dpkg-all src/main/unix/files/dpkg-default src/main/unix/files/dpkg-slave
Case: Packaging=jar, goal=attached-dpkg+attached-pkg, packages=default+slave => src/main/unix/files/all-all src/main/unix/files/all-default src/main/unix/files/all-slave src/main/unix/files/dpkg-default src/main/unix/files/dpkg-slave src/main/unix/files/pkg-default src/main/unix/files/pkg-slave
